class="space-y-4 text-center"><h3 class="break-words font-editorial text-mobile-h1 lg:text-h1"><div><a class="after:absolute after:inset-0 after:content-[&#x27;&#x27;] focus-visible:outline-none support:hover:text-brand-red duration-300 transition-colors" href="https://time.com/7327333/health-insurance-costs-increasing-2026/"><span>Why Your Health Insurance Costs Keep Rising</span></a></div></h3><p class="rich-text font-graphik-compact text-caption-large lg:px-16">Employer-based health insurance plans are expected to rise again for 2026. Here's what's behind the high costs.</p><p class="font-graphik-compact text-t4 text-grey-1">by <!-- -->Alana Semuels</p></div></article></li><li class="col-span-full my-auto inline-grid size-full mb-4
